companyName: Horizons ETF Trust I S&P 500 Covered Call
description:
The investment seeks investment results that, before fees and expenses, generally correspond to the performance of the CBOE S&P 500 2% OTM BuyWrite Index.
 The fund invests at least 80% of its total assets in securities that comprise its underlying index. The underlying index is comprised of all the equity securities in the S&P 500 Index (the "reference index") in substantially similar weight as the reference index and short (written) call options on up to 100% of the S&P 500 Index.
